"I would delete the emotion of jealousy because it causes unnecessary conflict and resentment, and can lead to destructive behaviors."
"I would delete the emotion of anger because it can lead to violence and aggression, and can cause long-term damage to relationships."
"I would delete the emotion of fear because it can limit our ability to take risks and make decisions, and can lead to anxiety and depression."
"I would delete the emotion of sadness because it can be debilitating and can lead to feelings of hopelessness and despair."
"I would delete the emotion of pride because it can lead to arrogance and entitlement, and can cause conflicts with others."
